page.title: 12EVENTS IN KINGS NORTON
page.content: Kings Norton Mop Fair is held on the 1st Monday in October on the village green.It was a hiring fair.People see- king work would go to the fair carrying the tools of their trade.A shepard took a crook,a milkmaid took a stool and the housemaid took a mop.This is how the fair came to be named!A small sum of money was given to seal the contract. This could be spent at the fair.Today the fair is held to collect money for charity,and to provide enjoyment.There is an ox roast and a baby show:a trav- eling fair puts up round-abouts and stalls.People come from miles around by car,bus, and train.We went on the ski jump; my mum won a raffle and she won a mirror and a pair of extra large tights.Then we had some candy floss it was pink I won a poster of Boy George. We went on the Walzers.By Jacqueline Clarke Sir Theodore Pritchet school.
